pkgmetadata.longdescription: CosmoloPy is a package of cosmology routines built on NumPy/SciPy.Capabilities include--------------------`cosmolopy.density` Various cosmological densities.`cosmolopy.distance` Various cosmological distance measures.`cosmolopy.luminosityfunction` Galaxy luminosity functions (Schecter functions).`cosmolopy.magnitudes` Conversion in and out of the AB magnitude system.`cosmolopy.parameters` Pre-defined sets of cosmological parameters (e.g. from WMAP).`cosmolopy.perturbation` Perturbation theory and the power spectrum.`cosmolopy.reionization` The reionization of the IGM.
